transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha sir boliye. 
Customer: Namaste ji namaskar.
Executive: Ha ha namaskar.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Thik hi hai. Kharab to bol nahi sakte hai. Thik hi na rahega.
Executive: Aapne ticket open ki thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Aap ticket open kiye the IndiaMART se.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aapne IndiaMART se ticket open kiye the apna uske through. IndiaMART helpline pe call karke.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Babu halla mat karo thoda sa baat karne do. Ha hello.
Customer: Boliye sir boliye.
Executive: Hello. Ji ji. Ha.
Customer: Boliye na.
Executive: Last time aapse baat hui thi manager sir ki.
Customer: Ha ha. To unhone aapse bola tha ki business chal raha hai matlab aap thoda bahut valid consume to karne ja rahe hain is time.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Valid aapne jo hai October valid consume kar liya November valid consume kar rahe hain ek do din mein November ko.
Customer: Ek baar fir se aapko call karna hoga. Update kar raha hai.
Executive: Awaaz jo hai na vibrate ho rahi hai.
Executive: Ab ab aa rahi hai awaaz? Hello.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's voice is vibrating.

- Wants to know about validity consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed validity consumption details.

- Informed customer to call again for updates.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- validity, subscription, buyleads
